text: “Ndipo (tsiku lina) adalowa mu mzinda mozemba, eni m’zindawo osadziwa. Ndipo adapeza m’menemo anthu awiri akumenyana, mmodzi wochokera ku gulu lake, ndipo winayo wochokera kwa adani ake. Tsono wa kugulu lake uja adampempha chithandizo pa mdani wake uja, ndipo Mûsa adammenya chibagera mpaka kumupha (mdaniyo). Adanena: “Iyi (ndachitayi) ndintchito ya satana; ndithu iye ndimdani wosokeretsa, woonekera.”
